messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Spank Out Day...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/28/03 10:24:24 AM, marji@gaiawolf.org writes:  I m glad you brought this.  I wish I had done up a collection of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/28/03 10:24:24 AM, marji@... writes:

<< www.stophitting.com >>

I'm glad you brought this. I wish I had done up a collection of stories
about how it works better without spanking before the last discussion here,
because I think someone ended up leaving this list over feeling it was
personal to/about her, that people were saying spanking was bad.

The site above and the collection of unschoolers' testimonials and
suggestions will help keep others we haven't even met yet from thinking it's
personal if/when the subject arises again!

Sandra

messages.subject: Spank Out Day...
messages.msgSnippet: I just found out about this from another list.  Did you know that this Wednesday is Spank Out Day USA ?  Well, it s news to me.  Provided is a list of
messages.messageBody:
I just found out about this from another list. Did you know that this
Wednesday is "Spank Out Day USA"? Well, it's news to me. Provided is a
list of activities for the day. I like the idea of writing to the newspaper.

Here's a website:

www.stophitting.com

Yours in Peace,

Marji
